title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 268/94 of 4 February 1994 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3477/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the raw tobacco quota system for the 1993 and 1994 harvests
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 268/94 of 4 February 1994 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3477/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the raw tobacco quota system for the 1993 and 1994 harvests
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 February 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
